refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Assign any shell variables that you need in this file. The file is always processed by /bin/sh or by the shell specified through SHOREWALL_SHELL in shorewall.conf (5) so the full range of shell capabilities may be used.
It is suggested that variable names begin with an upper case letter to distinguish them from variables used internally within the Shorewall programs
The following variable names must be avoided. Those in bold font must be avoided in all Shorewall versions; those in regular font must be avoided in versions prior to 4.4.8.

member.emphasis: Any name beginning with SHOREWALL_ or SW_

refsect1.para: This is the same as if the interfaces file had contained:
refsect1.programlisting: ZONE INTERFACE BROADCAST OPTIONS net eth0 130.252.100.255 routefilter,norfc1918
